name: Harmony (itch)
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 30 (entry page), enjoy. Full instructions on menu and tooltips available at the bottom of the screen during the game.

IMPORTANT

Please be aware, game can take a minute or two load from the main menu, during which time it might appear to have crashed. Please wait for the start game button to change when hovering over it.

(I don't know how to do loading screens/ran out of time! I'm sorry!)
